A

accuracy(int) - Method in class Library.generalizationtechniques.TrainingTechniques
Tracks the accuracy of the the current epoch using a counter.

B

Backprop - Class in Library.learningrules
 
Backprop(INDArray, INDArray, double) - Constructor for class Library.learningrules.Backprop
This is the constructor for back propagation class which requires the hiddenlayer weights, outputlayer weights and learning rate.
Backprop(INDArray, INDArray, double, INDArray, INDArray) - Constructor for class Library.learningrules.Backprop
The second constructor used when bias is implemented for each layer.

C

calculations(INDArray, INDArray, INDArray, INDArray) - Method in class Library.learningrules.Backprop
This method calculates the gradients, updates bias and the weights for layers.
createHiddenLayer(int, int) - Method in class Library.neuralnetwork.NeuralNetwork
This method creates the connection matrix between the input layer and hidden layer.
createOutputLayer(int, int) - Method in class Library.neuralnetwork.NeuralNetwork
This method creates the connection matrix between the hidden layer and output layer.

D

DeltaBarDelta - Class in Library.learningrules
This class is the main implementation of delta-bar-delta, it works in conjunction with the gradient collector class.
DeltaBarDelta() - Constructor for class Library.learningrules.DeltaBarDelta
 

E

expectedOutput(int) - Method in class Library.generalizationtechniques.TrainingTechniques
This method calculates and returns the expected output for the given data.

F

FeedForward - Class in Library.learningrules
This class has the main feed forward logic and implementation.

This is the constructor for feed forward which uses the val
FeedForward(INDArray, INDArray, INDArray, INDArray) - Constructor for class Library.learningrules.FeedForward
This is the constructor for feed forward including the bias
forwardPass(INDArray) - Method in class Library.learningrules.FeedForward
This method does the calculations for feed forward on the network
Functions - Class in Library.functions
Contains the general functions and mathematical equations used in learning.
Functions() - Constructor for class Library.functions.Functions
 

G

getOutputofHiddenLayer() - Method in class Library.learningrules.FeedForward
This method returns output at the Hidden Layer
getOutputofOutputLayer() - Method in class Library.learningrules.FeedForward
This method returns the output at the output layer
getUpdatedHiddenLayerWeights() - Method in class Library.learningrules.Backprop
This method returns the updated weights for hidden layer
getUpdatedOutputLayerWeights() - Method in class Library.learningrules.Backprop
This method returns the updated weights for output layer
getWeights() - Method in class Library.layer.LayerCreation
Getter method to return weights
GradientCollector - Class in Library.learningrules
This class is a general class that is based of the backprop class but this only calculates the gradients.
GradientCollector() - Constructor for class Library.learningrules.GradientCollector
 
gradients(INDArray, INDArray, INDArray, INDArray) - Method in class Library.learningrules.GradientCollector
 

H

Holdout(int) - Method in class Library.generalizationtechniques.TrainingTechniques
The main implementation of the holdout method which is called in the NeuralNetwork class, has an outer epoch loop which is controlled by the user and run through the main algorithm of learning.
holdoutTraining() - Method in class Library.neuralnetwork.NeuralNetwork
This method is what the user calls to run holdout training after the network has been initialized.

K

k_foldCrossValidation(int, int) - Method in class Library.generalizationtechniques.TrainingTechniques

Created by Abu on 4/23/2017.
LayerCreation(int, int) - Constructor for class Library.layer.LayerCreation
This method initializes the neuron class

Library.layer - package Library.layer
 
Library.learningrules - package Library.learningrules
 
Library.neuralnetwork - package Library.neuralnetwork
 
Library.test - package Library.test
 
loadAllFiles(String) - Method in class Library.neuralnetwork.NeuralNetwork
Loads all training and test file paths into a string list which is used later in loadTrainingFiles and loadTestingfiles.
loadTestingFiles(String) - Method in class Library.neuralnetwork.NeuralNetwork
This method returns a list of type INDArray containing all the lines of every testing file.
loadTrainingFiles(String) - Method in class Library.neuralnetwork.NeuralNetwork
This method returns a list of type INDArray containing all the lines of every training file.

M

Main - Class in Library.test
This class is the test class that calls on the library tools and creates the neural network.
Main() - Constructor for class Library.test.Main
 
main(String[]) - Static method in class Library.test.Main
 

N

NeuralNetwork - Class in Library.neuralnetwork
This is the main class that connects all other classes, this is what the user instantiates in the main class and calls whatever training method is needed.
NeuralNetwork(int, int, int, double) - Constructor for class Library.neuralnetwork.NeuralNetwork
The first constructor which gives the option of putting a learning rate in.
NeuralNetwork(int, int, int, double, String) - Constructor for class Library.neuralnetwork.NeuralNetwork
This constructer is used when the user only wants bias or learning rate implemented.
NeuralNetwork(int, int, int, double, String, String) - Constructor for class Library.neuralnetwork.NeuralNetwork
This constructer is used when the user would like to use all learning rules available in the library such as learningRate, bias and momentum.

R

Rpropagation - Class in Library.learningrules
This class contains the main implementation of rProp which works in conjunction with the gradient collector class.
Rpropagation() - Constructor for class Library.learningrules.Rpropagation
 

S

sigmoid(INDArray, Boolean) - Method in class Library.functions.Functions
This is method for sigmoid

T

trainingIndexArray() - Method in class Library.generalizationtechniques.TrainingTechniques
Creates a randomized list of integers based on the number of training examples.
TrainingTechniques - Class in Library.generalizationtechniques
This class holds all the implementations of training techniques such as holdout or k-fold cross validation.
TrainingTechniques(List<INDArray>, INDArray, INDArray, double) - Constructor for class Library.generalizationtechniques.TrainingTechniques
 
TrainingTechniques(List<INDArray>, INDArray, INDArray, double, String) - Constructor for class Library.generalizationtechniques.TrainingTechniques
This is the constructer that includes bias or momentum.
